tool_description: Extract texts from images with very high accuracy and supports all languages of the earth.
title: OCR - Extract text

api_list.name: Extract text from image url
api_list.description: Image must be a regular **JPEG** or **PNG** image (with or without transparency).

utterances.utterance: Can you extract the text from this image: https://example.com/image1.jpg?
Please get the text from the image located at https://images.com/sample.png.
What does the text say in this picture: https://myphotos.com/pic123.jpeg?
Extract the text from this URL: https://content.com/photo.png.
Can you tell me the text in the image at https://example.org/image2.jpg?
I need the text from this image: https://photos.net/picture.jpeg.
What text is in the image found at https://imgsource.com/img.png?
Please extract the text from the image at https://exampleimages.com/photo.jpg.
Can you retrieve the text from this image URL: https://mywebsite.com/image.png?
Get the text from the image located here: https://sampleimages.com/pic.jpeg.

api_list.name: Extract text from image file
api_list.description: Image must be a regular **JPEG** or **PNG** image (with or without transparency).

utterances.utterance: Can you extract the text from this image file?
Please read the text from this JPEG image.
I need the text content from this PNG image.
Could you extract the words from this picture?
What does this image say? Please extract the text.
Get the text from this photo for me.
Can you pull the text out of this graphic?
I need the text extracted from this digital image.
Please extract the text from this scanned image.
What text is in this image file? Can you extract it?

api_list.name: Extract text from image file
api_list.description: Image must be a regular **JPEG** or **PNG** image (with or without transparency).

utterances.utterance: Can you extract the text from this image file?
Please read the text from this JPEG image.
What does this PNG image say?
Extract the text content from this picture.
Can you tell me the text in this photo?
I need the text from this scanned document image.
Please extract any words from this image.
What text is present in this digital image?
Can you retrieve the text from this graphic file?
Please read and extract the text from this visual file.
